name: awesomeprompts
description: A curated collection of AI prompts for thumbnails, videos, illustrations, and more
author: AwesomePrompts Community

scripts.build: astro build && pagefind --site dist && cp -r dist/pagefind public/
scripts.dev:search: bun scripts/buildIndex.ts && astro build && pagefind --site dist && cp -r dist/pagefind public/ && astro dev
